Html:
Have you any Ide how to fix the Speed issue???

And also if you try to scroll in the VirualisationExample via dragging the Thumb, it crashes!

I dont think virtualization isnt working. In the virtalization sample the items load in 175 ms. When disabling it, it takes 7060 ms.

But I already realized the exception when dragging the scroll bar. But at the moment im not sure what causes this. It happens in OnDelayCleanup of the VirtualizationStackPanel. I dont think there is any code of me running.

IÂ´m still looking at this and entered a bug.
